dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 231 IH: Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Hageman introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To amend the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2015, to reauthorize the Colorado River System conservation pilot program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of Colorado River System conservation pilot program
section.text: Section 206 of the Energy and Water Development and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2015 (43 U.S.C. 620 note; Public Law 113–235), is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (b)(2), by striking this Act and inserting the Colorado River Basin System Conservation Extension Act of 2025;
in subsection (c)(2), by striking 2024 and inserting 2026; and
in subsection (d), by striking 2025 and inserting 2027.
